name: LightCube (SuBiScript, Crynano, Sega025)
description:
GENRE AND LORE :

First-person puzzle game in the tradition of science fiction and set in the year 2202 in a mysterious monolith. 

You wake up, alone, in a strange place. You don’t know where you are and you don’t remember how you got inside this new environment.

You notice that you are in a locked room and next to you, there is a special weapon that has been linked to your right arm. It is at this point, when you realize that the grabbed weapon will allow you to change and adapt the architectural structure of the environment, being possible to move through the different rooms by solving the challenging puzzles found in each area.
